hanzi-su-wiki:
鋼

Значения

Сталь

Мнемоника

Металл 金 особой прочности с горных перевалов 岡 — сталь.

Варианты

钢

steel

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 钢)
Pictophonetic: 岡 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
鋼鐵 [ gāng tiě ]: steel
鋼琴 [ gāng qín ]: piano; Classifiers: 架
鋼材 [ gāng cái ]: steel (as raw material); steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
鋼筋 [ gāng jīn ]: steel reinforcing bar
鋼筆 [ gāng bǐ ]: fountain pen; Classifiers: 支

• ⿰ Left to right

    • 岡 [ gāng ] ridge or crest of hill
heisig_chinese_memo: Mount Fuji is completely made up of a metal known as steel.
koohiiStory1: Mount Fuji is completely made up of a metal known as steel.
koohiiStory2: Ancient shamans predicted a time when there would be Mounts made of metal. The steel skyscrapers of today…　　　　　　　　RTK2: 　コウ　鋼鉄　こうてつ(steel)…　Semi-Pure Group:　綱1963　(ｺﾞｳ): 剛1964.
jp_example_words: 鉄鋼(てっこう): iron and steel
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You come across a gold hill. You think you hit it big! You start digging, only to find out that it is merely a paper-thin layer of gold covering a hill of steel.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Dig out many other spots. Every time, it's just steel under there.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You report your findings about the steel you found to Emperor こういち. He is displeased that it is a hill of steel.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "I suppose I can use this steel, even if it is not a hill of gold," he says. "We will make steel weapons, which we will use to subjugate other nations. The whole world will learn kanji using the WaniKani system!"
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 岡 (おか、コウ холм). Не путать: 綱 (つな、コウ трос).
Ru_Radicals: 并, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 山 (гора), 金 (золото), 岡 (холм)
Ru_trainchinese:
gāng: (сущ) сталь
gàng: (глаг) укреплять острие (ножа) с помощью стали; точить, заострять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the gold (金) from the hill (岡) is steel
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The piece of metal on the ridge of a hill is the mysterious steel sword which can't be pulled out of the ground.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " gold " to " oka " sound. The original meaning is an alloy of iron and carbon. "Jade articles. "The Ministry of Gold": "Steel, chain and iron." "Ji Yun. "Tang Yun": "Steel, solid iron." Northern Song Dynasty Shen Kuo, "Mengxi Bi Tan. Dialectics 1: "Every iron has steel. If there are ribs in the bar, the bar is soft and soft. The bar is the same. The same is true for steel, but the forging of fine iron is more than a hundred fires. Each forging is called one Forging is light, and forging to be tired without reducing the weight, the pure steel is also. Although a hundred refining does not consume too much, this is the pure iron. Its color is clear and bright, and when it is polished, it is dark and blue and black, similar to ordinary iron Very different." Such as "Liezi. "Tang Wen": "The sword is as long as it is close, and the red blade is drilled with steel; it is used to cut jade like clay." "Wei Shu. "Biography of Yanfeng": "The Northerners of the Qing Dynasty, no steel armored weapon, if the enemy is weak, then advance, strong and retreat, and can merge?" "Journey to the West" Chapter 6: "Two steel knives have a chance, one come There is no thread in it."

" Steel " means hard. "Ji Yun. "Dang Yun": "Steel, strong." Such as "Ming Yi Tongzhi. "The Commander of the Capital of Sichuan": "(Tieshishan) has Nishi, burned into iron, which is extremely steely for swords and halberds."
humanum_short_description_en: From " gold " to " oka " sound. The original meaning is an alloy of iron and carbon.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「岡」聲。本義是鐵和碳的合金。《玉篇．金部》：「鋼，鍊鐵也。」《集韻．唐韻》：「鋼，堅鐵。」北宋沈括《夢溪筆談．辯證一》：「凡鐵之有鋼者，如麫中有筋，濯盡柔麫，則麫筋乃見。煉鋼亦然，但取精鐵鍛之百餘火，每鍛稱之，一鍛一輕，至累鍛而斤兩不減，則純鋼也。雖百鍊不耗矣，此乃鐵之精純者。其色清明，磨瑩之，則黯黯然青且黑，與常鐵迥異。」如《列子．湯問》：「其劍長尺有咫，練鋼赤刃；用之切玉如切泥焉。」《魏書．燕鳳列傳》：「卿輩北人，無鋼甲利器，敵弱則進，彊即退走，安能并兼？」《西遊記》第6回：「兩個鋼刀有見機，一來一往無絲縫。」

　　「鋼」引申表示堅硬。《集韻．宕韻》：「鋼，堅也。」如《明一統志．四川行都指揮使司》：「（鐵石山）有砮石，燒之成鐵，為劍戟極鋼利。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「岡」聲。本義是鐵和碳的合金。

鉄鋼(てっこう): iron and steel
從「 金 」，「 岡 」聲。本義是鐵和碳的合金。《玉篇．金部》：「鋼，鍊鐵也。」《集韻．唐韻》：「鋼，堅鐵。」北宋沈括《夢溪筆談．辯證一》：「凡鐵之有鋼者，如麫中有筋，濯盡柔麫，則麫筋乃見。煉鋼亦然，但取精鐵鍛之百餘火，每鍛稱之，一鍛一輕，至累鍛而斤兩不減，則純鋼也。雖百鍊不耗矣，此乃鐵之精純者。其色清明，磨瑩之，則黯黯然青且黑，與常鐵迥異。」如《列子．湯問》：「其劍長尺有咫，練鋼赤刃；用之切玉如切泥焉。」《魏書．燕鳳列傳》：「卿輩北人，無鋼甲利器，敵弱則進，彊即退走，安能并兼？」《西遊記》第6回：「兩個鋼刀有見機，一來一往無絲縫。」 「 鋼 」引申表示堅硬。《集韻．宕韻》：「鋼，堅也。」如《明一統志．四川行都指揮使司》：「（鐵石山）有砮石，燒之成鐵，為劍戟極鋼利。」

gāng, gàng
вм. 钢
Radicals: 金, 岡  (gold, hill)
Meaning Mnemonic
You come across a gold hill. You think you hit it big! You start digging, only to find out that it is merely a paper-thin layer of gold covering a hill of steel.
Dig out many other spots. Every time, it's just steel under there.
Reading Mnemonic
You report your findings about the steel you found to Emperor こういち. He is displeased that it is a hill of steel.
"I suppose I can use this steel, even if it is not a hill of gold," he says. "We will make steel weapons, which we will use to subjugate other nations. The whole world will learn kanji using the WaniKani system!"
